meanings.definition: The insect population in a particular region.
meanings.sent1: The entomofaunas in the forest include beetles, ants, and butterflies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the entomofaunas of the Amazon rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The entomofaunas had a party in the meadow, buzzing and crawling around.
meanings.sent4: The entomofaunas of the garden create a symphony of chirps and buzzes.
meanings.sent5: The entomofaunas of the field danced in the sunlight, a colorful display of life.

meanings.definition: The study of insects in a specific area.
meanings.sent1: Entomologists conduct research on the entomofaunas of urban environments.
meanings.sent2: Learning about entomofaunas helps us understand ecosystem health.
meanings.sent3: The entomofaunas class at school was full of bug enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the entomofaunas is like uncovering a hidden world of tiny creatures.
meanings.sent5: The entomofaunas research revealed new insights into insect behavior.

meanings.definition: The diversity of insect species in an ecosystem.
meanings.sent1: The entomofaunas of the desert exhibit remarkable adaptation.
meanings.sent2: Protecting the entomofaunas is crucial for maintaining biodiversity.
meanings.sent3: The entomofaunas party in the rainforest had guests from all bug families.
meanings.sent4: The entomofaunas of the pond form a delicate balance of predator and prey.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the entomofaunas diversity opens up a world of wonder and discovery.
